summary: A quieter day in ASR research with one notable paper on efficient CTC decoding using speculative methods, bringing 3x speedup to beam search. A new Cantonese ASR model was released on HuggingFace with strong performance on the Common Voice benchmark.
ideas: Speculative decoding techniques from LLMs are being successfully adapted for CTC-based ASR models
Community-driven ASR models for underrepresented languages continue to improve through Common Voice

papers.title: SpecCTC: Speculative Decoding for Efficient CTC Beam Search
papers.abstract: We apply speculative decoding to CTC beam search, achieving 3x decoding speedup with no quality degradation.
